name: Ball Wall
description:
Play now!
The ultimate stress test, or just for fun.

Can you avoid all enemies in time?
In this fun game you have to get as far as possible between the enemies and you can collect coins.
You can use the bottom wall, but also the top wall.
The further you progress in the game, the more types of enemies you will encounter.
You only have one chance to continue, if you're done you have to start all over again.

In the next updates:
- Adding multiple types of maps where there are even more enemies.
- Also playable on MacOS devices.
